MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Azure.Management.Consumption.Models.PriceSheetResult Get (this Microsoft.Azure.Management.Consumption.IPriceSheetOperations operations, string expand = null, string skiptoken = null);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Consumption.Models.PriceSheetResult Get(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Consumption.IPriceSheetOperations operations, string expand, string skiptoken) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function Get (operations As IPriceSheetOperations, Optional expand As String = null, Optional skiptoken As String = null) As PriceSheetResult

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
May be used to expand the properties/meterDetails within a price sheet. By default, these fields are not included when returning price sheet.

Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
Docs.summary: Gets the price sheet for a scope by subscriptionId. Price sheet is available via this API only for May 1, 2014 or later.
